name: 適應體育
goals: 認識適應體育的哲學觀
瞭解各類特殊學生的心理動作特質與復建原則
有效評估與評量各類特殊學生的動作表現
發展對適應體育教學與活動推展的熱情與參與動機
syllabus:
Week 1.   課程介紹、評量方式 Introduction

Week 2.   適應體育基本概念 The Basic Concepts of Adapted Physical Education

Week 3.   適應體育趨勢發展沿革 Trends of Adapted Physical Education

Week 4.   新課綱中身體素養導向的體育教學法

Physical Literacy and Teaching Methods in New Curriculum Updates

Week 5.   新課綱體育教學方法種類

Types of Teaching Methods in New Curriculum Updates

Week 6.   新課綱體育教學技術  
Techniques of Teaching Methods in New Curriculum Updates

Week 7.   新課綱體育教學評鑑  
Evaluations of Teaching Methods in New Curriculum Updates

Week 8.   新課綱體育教學教案  
Teaching showcases of Teaching Methods in New Curriculum Updates

Week 9.   期中報告   Midterm Report

Week 10.  108新課綱中的適應體育之教學策略與課程設計 I

          Teaching Strategies and Course Designs in Adapted Physical Education in  
New Curriculum Updates I

Week 11.  108新課綱中的適應體育之教學策略與課程設計 I

          Teaching Strategies and Course Designs in Adapted Physical Education in  
New Curriculum Updates II

Week 12.  適應體育活動之測驗與評量  
          Examinations and Evaluations in Adapted Physical Education

Week 13.  動作學習與協調  
          Motor Learning and Coordination in Adapted Physical Education

Week 14.  健康與體適能  
          Health and Physical Fitness in Adapted Physical Education

Week 15.  行為改變技術與正向行為支持  
          Behavior Modification and Positive Behavior Support

Week 16.  無障礙運動設施與場地

          Accessible Exercise Environment

Week 17.  跨領域合作教學

          Interdisciplinary Collaboration

Week 18.  期末報告  Final Presentation

methodologies.note: 專業人士研討、課外閱讀
